li.label: no herd
li.description: I'm the only one of my kind. I feel so unsafe being all alone.

li.label: small herd
li.description: There's another like me, but we're still only a small herd. I still don't feel very safe.

li.label: decent herd
li.description: There's a decent number of people in my herd. Safety in numbers!

li.label: huge herd
li.description: There's plenty of people in my herd. There's nothing to fear!

li.label: awful bedroom
li.description: I had to sleep alone in an awful room, without even my herd to keep me safe.

li.label: dull bedroom
li.description: I had to sleep alone in an dull room, without even my herd to keep me safe.

li.label: mediocre bedroom
li.description: I had to sleep in a room all by myself, away from the safety of the herd.

li.label: decent bedroom
li.description: I had to sleep in a room all by myself, away from the safety of the herd.

li.label: slightly impressive bedroom
li.description: I had to sleep on my own in a slightly impressive bedroom. It was alright, but I felt unsafe without the rest of my herd.

li.label: impressive bedroom
li.description: I slept on my own in an impressive bedroom. It was fine, but I would have felt safer with the rest of my herd.

li.label: very impressive bedroom
li.description: I slept in a very impressive bedroom on my own. It's nice, but I miss my herd.

li.label: extremely impressive bedroom
li.description: I slept in an extremely impressive bedroom. It's great, but I wish my herdmates were there.

li.label: unbelievably impressive bedroom
li.description: I slept in an unbelievably impressive bedroom. It was marvelous, but I felt like something was missing without my herd.

li.label: wondrously impressive bedroom
li.description: I slept in a heavenly bedroom. It was so astounding, I didn't even mind sleeping away from the rest of the herd.

li.label: awful barrack
li.description: The herd had to sleep in an awful barrack, but at least we had safety in numbers.

li.label: dull barrack
li.description: The herd had to sleep in a dull barrack, but at least we had safety in numbers.

li.label: mediocre barrack
li.description: I slept together with the herd in a mediocre barrack. It's safer than sleeping alone, at least.

li.label: decent barrack
li.description: I slept together together with the herd in a decent barrack. It was safe and comforting.

li.label: slightly impressive barrack
li.description: I slept in a pretty nice barrack with the rest of my herd. This is great.

li.label: impressive barrack
li.description: I slept in an impressive barrack with the rest of my herd. I love it.

li.label: very impressive barrack
li.description: I got to sleep in a very impressive barrack with my herd. It was wonderful.

li.label: extremely impressive barrack
li.description: I got to sleep in an extremely impressive barrack with my herd. It was truly marvelous.

li.label: unbelievably impressive barrack
li.description: I got to sleep in a barrack that was unbelievably impressive, and I even got to share it with my herd.

li.label: wondrously impressive barrack
li.description: The herd got to share a barrack that was simply wondrous. I could just stay here with my herd forever.

li.label: ascetic slept alone
li.description: I had to sleep in a room by myself, away from the safety of my herd.

li.label: ascetic slept with herd
li.description: I was able to share a barrack with my herd. It felt safe and comfy.
